item.title: Feel the Fear and Do It Anyway
item.description: Susan Jeffers provides a number of useful models for understanding why we are afraid, and how to act despite our fear.

item.title: Phone Setup
item.description: I’ve had a really good relationship with my smartphone recently, through just like — disconnecting the thing from the internet. Things like:
